about_the_game:
GREAT TOY SHOWDOWN is a casual shooting game where 8 animal toys battle it out in action-packed matches!

The "Furr-sting Showdown" to steal toy parts and survive begins now.

Join the fluffiest battle in the world and become the last animal toy standing!

GREAT TOY SHOWDOWN begin early access in the 5th of November 2024,

It is planned to be officially released in Q4 2025 to support mobile and Nintendo Switch cross-platforms.

Key Features

  • With a streamlined team battle royale format, anyone can jump in and enjoy the fun!

  • You don’t have to bully other toys to feel the thrill of growth.

  • Our unique yet simple graphics shine even on low-spec PCs and consoles, giving you smooth gameplay no matter your setup.

  • Challenge players from around the globe in team battles and show off your skills to become the ultimate toy champion!

Hunt down Fearsome Monsters!

Team up with your crew to take down monsters, survive, gain experience, and level up. Work together to divide roles, plan your optimal farming and leveling routes, and execute your strategy flawlessly.

Explore the Map and Grow Stronger!

Send out your trusty chick drone to expand your territory and uncover hidden spaces. Hunt down monsters guarding these areas and claim valuable items that give you a tactical edge in battle.

Be the Last Team Standing!

As you explore, you’ll encounter rival toy teams. When that happens, don’t hesitate—use every weapon and artifact you’ve got to take them down!Even if you fall, as long as one of your teammates is still alive, there’s hope for revival. Take down the other three teams, and victory is yours!

Join the battlefield of the GREAT TOY SHOWDOWN, see what we're building alongside our community, and help shape the future of the game!
